content: the scrap yard headphones case is a great stash-buster and a fun way to accessorize your headphones this listing includes a beginner-friendly pdf crochet pattern in english this pattern was designed for the airpods pro case but can be used for any other headphones case of similar size the piece is worked as two separate panels that are seamed together the panels are worked in the round the gauge and recommended yarn is not included - sport or worsted weight yarn is recommended but don t mix and match the two weights the approximate dimensions of the panel after each round is included - use up your scraps for this project materials -5mm crochet hook -1 stitch marker -scrap yarn sport weight or worsted weight option to use 4 different colours approx measurements -7 5cm x 7 5cm not including the straps strap length is approx 7cm long
